rows.label: tlk70000089_02_msg0001
rows.name:
You have to hand it to the
Emperor, he really knows how
to command the human spirit!

rows.label: tlk70000089_02_msg0002
rows.name:
What? It's not from government
business, just the result of interacting
with so many different people?

rows.label: tlk70000089_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Hrm, I see... This is something
we Gulan must learn from.

rows.label: tlk70000089_02_msg0004
rows.name:
It's not possible to gain
the people's trust just by
dishing out orders...

rows.label: tlk70000089_02_msg0005
rows.name:
No...it seems that the best way is to
speak to them on a personal level and try
to see things from their perspective.
